channel.title: Interface help
channel.description:
I've never been good at this so
How would I make it if you click on a portal it sends a warning message like
"Your about to go to a dangerous area, are you sure you want to go?"
Any help is appreciated :)
using delta :P

item.title: Interface help
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:3, topic:341502”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=437902.msg3218182#msg3218182 date=1274908273]
Well one thing you could do is this

[code=Java] public boolean askedToEnter = false;

public void goToThatPlace() {
	askedToEnter = true;
	changeText126("Your about to go to a dangerous area, are you sure you want to go?", 2460);
	changeText126("Yes.", 2461);
	changeText126("No.", 2462);
	sendFrame164(2459);
}[/code]

Than in your clicking method under case 9157: add

if (c.askedToEnter) { c.triggerTele(CoordsX, CoordsY, HeightLevel); c.askedToEnter = false; }

Thats a simple way of doing it.
[/quote]i’ve seen it done way easier no offense. uh thanks anyway ill figure it out[/quote]this is the only thing i still dont understand… how to fucking send a simple fucking frame. i dont even get how the “Yes” frame works.

Read full topic

Than in your clicking method under case 9157: add

Thats a simple way of doing it.[/quote]i’ve seen it done way easier no offense. uh thanks anyway ill figure it out

item.title: Interface help
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Well one thing you could do is this

[code=Java] public boolean askedToEnter = false;

public void goToThatPlace() {
	askedToEnter = true;
	changeText126("Your about to go to a dangerous area, are you sure you want to go?", 2460);
	changeText126("Yes.", 2461);
	changeText126("No.", 2462);
	sendFrame164(2459);
}[/code]

Than in your clicking method under case 9157: add

if (c.askedToEnter) { c.triggerTele(CoordsX, CoordsY, HeightLevel); c.askedToEnter = false; }

Thats a simple way of doing it.
